front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks - Secure Device Identity

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: A Secure Device Identifier (DevID) is cryptographically bound to a device and supports authentication of the deviceâ€™s identity. An Initial Device Identifier (IDevID) provide by the supplier of a device can be supplemented by Local Device Identifiers (LDevIDs) facilitating enrollment (provisioning of authentication and authorization credentials) by local network administrators. (The PDF of this standard is available at no cost compliments of the IEEE GET Program at https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/browse/standards/get-program/page/series?id=68)
